definitions.definition: To examine something with great care or detail , as to look for hidden or obscure flaws .
examples: to scrutinize the conduct or motives of individuals

definitions.definition: To audit accounts etc in order to verify them.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To examine something with great care or detail , as to look for hidden or obscure flaws .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To audit accounts etc in order to verify them.
